name: OCG ER555-ADS conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Anti-Drone Sniper conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-ADS conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to an Anti-Drone Sniper, a long range drone killer. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER555-CAR conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Carbine conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-CAR conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Carbine, a jack-of-all-trades.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER555-CQB conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Close Quarters Battle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-CQB conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to Close Quarters Battle configuration, an all-in-one firearm and polearm good in both roles.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER555-SAW conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Squad Automatic Weapon conversion kit, recommended accessories and one ammo belt in a separate fireproof container. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-SAW conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Squad Automatic Weapon, which also serves as battle rifle. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER555-SR conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Sniper Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-SR conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Sniper Rifle, highly accurate within its effective range. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER555-UDD conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 Urban Drone Destroyer conversion kit, recommended accessories, some grenades and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER555-UDD conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to an Urban Drone Destroyer, OmniCorp's close-quarters drone killer.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG ER-QR555 conversion pack
description: A briefcase with an ER555 to QR555 Battle Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories, grenades and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG ER-QR555 conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a base Electrothermal Rifle 555 to a purely chemical propelled, integrally suppressed "Quiet" Rifle 555.  In order to convert an already-configured ER555 to QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model first. The QR555 has its own line of conversion kits.

name: OCG QR555-CAR conversion pack
description: A briefcase with a QR555 Carbine conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG QR555-CAR conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Carbine, a short ranged jack-of-all-trades.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG QR555-SMG conversion pack
description: A briefcase with a QR555 Submachinegun conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG QR555-SMG conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Submachinegun, sort of like a suppressed P90 on steroids with bayonet. In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG QR555-DMR conversion pack
description: A briefcase with a QR555 Designated Marksman Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG QR555-DMR conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Designated Marksman Rifle, highly accurate with any ammo and "silent" with subsonic rounds. In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG QR555-SAW conversion pack
description: A briefcase with a QR555 Squad Automatic Weapon conversion kit, recommended accessories and one ammo belt assembly kit for up to 500 subsonic rounds in a separate fireproof container. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG QR555-SAW conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Squad Automatic Weapon, sort of like a suppressed P90 on double steroids with bipod. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

name: OCG QR-ER555 conversion pack
description: A briefcase with a QR555 to ER555 Battle Rifle conversion kit and recommended magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

name: OCG QR-ER555 conversion kit
description: All the parts necessary to convert a "Quiet" Rifle 555 to a louder, UPS-consuming and more powerful Electrothermal Rifle 555.  In order to convert an already-configured QR555 to ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model first. The ER555 has its own line of conversion kits.
